posts.post_content:
I have available for sale this 1889 N29 Buck Ewing.  Has beautiful eye appeal but was downgraded for what appears to be a small "tear" in the back paper that goes from the bottom of the 2nd L in Allen, down to the bottom border.  See closeup scan of the area.  Does NOT affect the front of the card at all.

Price is $1,000 net to me via paypal.
